import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel' import {useState, useRef} from 'react' import img1 from "./../first.jpg" import img2 from "./../second.jpg" import img3 from "./../third.jpg" import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import DateInput from "./../Components/DateInput" import Collapse from 'react-bootstrap/Collapse' import Jumbotron from 'react-bootstrap/Jumbotron' const captionStyle = { marginBottom:"2%" }; function ControlledCarousel() { const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const[displayed, setDisplayed] = useState(false); const myRef = useRef() const handleSelect = (selectedIndex, e) => { setIndex(selectedIndex); }; const handleDisplay = (event) => { myRef.current.scrollIntoView({behavior: "smooth"}) setDisplayed(true) } const button = ; return (
